title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not available.
EB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry should be available.
SR:
Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource

1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
2. Open the context menu and check if the 'Team' entry is available.
